snippet.title: Halo E3 2000 Trailer (4k60fps Upscaled)
snippet.description:
Halo 2 Multiplayer Map Pack - Halo E3 2000 Trailer
Ripped and Converted from the Halo 2 Multiplayer Map Pack Disc which is technically an Xbox original game. 
(Made for archival preservation)

An in-engine cinematic trailer for Halo shown at E3 2000.

Original 'Converted' File Details:
N/A x N/A | 29.97 fps | N/A kbps Bitrate | N/A MB file size

Upscaled File Details:
3840 x 2160 | 60 fps | 23550 kbps Bitrate | 1.59 GB file size

Tools in order:
Xemu (to check iso file)
Something to extract iso files (I forgot what I used)
VGMToolbox r1040 (to extract/convert .sfd files)
ffmpeg (to convert to mp4)
ChatGTP 4.0 (For when I was too dumb about converting using ffmpeg)
Topaz Video AI v4.2.0 (to upscale)
Flowframes 1.40.0 (to interpolate)
